page.title: 21How our school has changed since 1986
page.content:
THEN NOW

2 classrooms 4 classrooms

2 teachers 6 teachers

0 classroom assistants 4 classroom assistants

No library library

31 pupils 96 pupils

Special needs room

Staffroom

Office

Kitchen/cook no dinners/ kitchen

4 children's toilets 8 children's toilets

1 adult toilet 2 adult toilets

Blackboards interactive whiteboards

1 computer 20 computers/laptops

Tiled floors carpeted floors

Curtains vertical blinds/curtains

Outdoor play equipment

Vegetable patch

Outdoor classroom

Shelter shelter

Outdoor storage

Pond

Lyn Morrow
